column1: #Text=Wikinews interviews U.S. Constitution Party presidential candidate Max Riekse
#Text=Wikinews held an exclusive interview with Max Riekse , one of the candidates for the Constitution Party nomination for the 2008 United States presidential election .
#Text=Riekse is a retired decorated United States Lieutenant Colonel in the United States Army who served in both the Vietnam War and the Iraq War .
#Text=He is also a former public school teacher and Assistant Professor of Military Science at Western Michigan University .

#Text=He has a B.A. in Political Science and International Relations from the University of South Florida as well as two M.A.s , one in Political Science and International Relations , the other in Eductaion and History .
#Text=We asked him if he thinks he has a good shot at winning the Constitution Party nomination and ultimately the presidency .
#Text=He replied , " I will give it my best shot because I think I can do better then all previous Constitution Party presidential candidates ... .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=When asked about America 's public school system he said ,  Local school boards and the people they are responsible to are the best judge of what is needed ; this with state oversight , will help boost public school quality & education .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Riekse is running for president because he has been  very tired of our Republican and Democratic choices for president for many years .
